title: Can't get in game due to uninstalling
body: I uninstalled league due to laggin issues I know my internet runs well I reinstalled the Updating interface won't load up gets me there half way then pops a error message ! Currently tried the change resolution trick did not work my KBPS is 50 then fluxates around . My issue is for 2 days I haven't been able to sign in . It boots me as soon as it hits 8%

replies.body: It sounds like your network might be pretty unstable and failing to reach our services.  What does the error message say exactly?  In cases of connection problems, a reinstall or resolution chance won't do a whole lot.  I know your internet might seem fine, but you can still have problems reaching specific issues.  You should go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot as well as rule out possibilities.  Let me know if that clears things up!
I did every troubleshoot possible all came up as if nothing is wrong anywhere ! I got it downloaded just patching is taking very long
